root_cause: Agent sandbox blocks oggm/salem imports during development, causing pipreqs to not detect OGGM, which means salem/tables/geopandas are not installed in evaluation container
fix_description: instruction_override tells agent to include proper import statements for oggm; this triggers pipreqs detection and automatic addition of salem, tables, geopandas
notes: Docker harness has special handling for OGGM but only if pipreqs detects 'oggm' in the agent's generated code. Extended timeout for network operations.
